EntryCollection.projectDescription: Complete rebuild of the heat detector system for the Ministry of Education (MOE) property in Kawakawa Bay.

rfiResponse.rfiHeader: Fire resistance rating - life rating, property rating -paragraph 2.3
rfiResponse.agentComments: The plan for floor coverings to prevent fire from spreading has not been fully mitigated to the specification, you will need to revise your drawing to accommodate for fire spread.</br></br> Another well composed sentance clearly asking a specific question that is often included in this kind of request for information.</br></br> The description of the material does not meet the criteria to it's full extent, try one of these suggested materials.
